description: Source code for an asynchronous Azure Blob Storage service class that facilitates uploading files or streams to Azure Blob Storage, including handling connection setup via environment variables, the actual upload methods, and error handling.

classes.name: AzureBlobService
classes.description: Service class providing async upload functionality to Azure Blob Storage, loading configuration from environment variables and exposing an async API.

methods.name: get_blob_service_client(self)
methods.description: Lazily creates and returns a BlobServiceClient instance in an async-safe manner.

methods.name: str upload_fileobj_async(self, file_obj, blob_name: str)
methods.description: Uploads a file-like object to Azure Blob Storage asynchronously, returning the URL of the uploaded blob and handling Azure-specific errors.

methods.name: str upload_local_file_async(self, local_path: str, blob_name: str)
methods.description: Reads a local file asynchronously and uploads it to Azure Blob Storage, returning the blob's URL.

ctags.name: upload_fileobj_async
ctags.pattern: /^    async def upload_fileobj_async(self, file_obj, blob_name: str) -> str:$/

ctags.name: upload_local_file_async
ctags.pattern: /^    async def upload_local_file_async(self, local_path: str, blob_name: str) -> str:$/
